lets-talk-form.header: Are you curious about something? Let’s talk
lets-talk-form.name: Name
lets-talk-form.message-placeholder: Hi, I would like to know about...
lets-talk-form.privacy-policy: I’ve read and, agree  the privacy policy

data.title: Who will deliver my pieces?
data.description: We deliver your pieces with a member of our experience style concierge. All of our style concierges are trained aside with each of our brand partners to insure you receive the fullest luxury experience, comfortably and stress free.

data.title: How long do I have to try my pieces?
data.description: Your stylist will arrive within your chosen one-hour window from then you will have 40 minutes to try and make a decision. Don’t worry, 40 minutes is a comfortable amount of time as on average 14 minutes is usually spent in a fitting room.

data.title: Does the Style Concierge come into my home?
data.description: Depending on which option you choose, ‘we wait you try’ or ‘assist me’. We wait you try: Your stylist will deliver your pieces, you will then have 40 minutes to try. When you have chosen the pieces you would like to keep, just simply pay and we take back the unsold items for you. Assist me: Your stylist will unpack your pieces and help you throught out your appointment with any styling advice and any tailoring if needed.

data.title: Is there any obligation to buy?
data.description: Simply no. Emays helps you to find pieces you love, while making it easier to return the pieces you don’t — saving you time and effort. We want to make you feel confident and comfortable in your choices, without any pressure to buy.

data.title: How can I modify my appointment?
data.description: Please contact Emays customer service team by emailing info@emaysstyle.com.

book-appointment.searchAddress: Please search your address street or complete address

customize-experience.checkbox-wait-label: We wait while you try -  Contactless Delivery - We drop the items to your door  and the stylist will wait for your returns outside.
customize-experience.checkbox-assist-label: Assist me -  I would like to be assisted during the whole appointment by the stylist.
customize-experience.checkbox-basic-label: Basic Tailoring - I require Pinning and fitting.
customize-experience.checkbox-inspire-label: Inspire me - Bring me additional items to try for free!

email-launch.thank: Thank you for booking your Chanel appointment.
email-launch.info: (Your 40 minute appointment will begin when your Emays Stylist arrives).

time-info.message: We’re looking forward to seeing you on:

email-launch.contact-message: we will contact you the day before your appointment, as well as a reminder on the day

special-info.line-one: We look forward to seeing you, but should you be unable to attend then please note our cancellation policy below.
special-info.line-two: We require at least 24 hours notice should you wish to make any changes or amendments to your scheduled appointment. Should you not inform us of any change within 24 hours notice, you will be charged the service fee.

mail.part-one: We are unable to receive responses to this email. If you need assistance, go to
mail.part-two: sent you this email. By using our services, you agree to our customer agreement.

cancellation.dialogue-header: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?
cancellation.dialogue-body: This action may cause losing items you were trying to buy
cancellation.info-body: You can close this browser window

contact-details.info-text: We will call or message you the day before, as well as at the moment of arriving to ensure the quality of experience.

shopping-bag-container.instruction-1: This fee helps us run our operations, all services included.

environment-header.env-header-h5-subhead: Carbon footprint is considered with every step of our service.

icon-img-text.text-h5: Over one-third of online fashion orders ends with a return, with two journeys for each: one to deliver and another to collect. This doubles the miles driven for each shop. With Emays, these delivery and return trips are combined, we cuts those miles in half by combining the delivery and return journey.

icon-text-img.text-h5: Emays delivery service is designed with the environment in mind  providing the best shopping experience for modern customers. We always strive for excellent customer service experience and take an intentional approach by reducing our environmental impact by delivering an all-inclusive store experience to your door with our zero-emission cars to make style more sustainable, for people and planet.

img-text-icon.text-h5: Emays delivers using packaging-free, hanging garments bags. This service aim to avoid the use of plastic and erase the disposable packaging.

text-img.text-h5: We partner with OneTreePlanted, and we support their projects. We plant one tree for every order that we complete, helping to clean the air that we breath, restore forests, create habitat for biodiversity, and make a positive social impact around the world.

col-1.title: IN STORE SHOPPING EXPERIENCE
col-1.subtitle-h3: Try what you want, pay only what you keep
col-1.btn-text: See what we can do for you

services.text-h1: Our Services are available on selected brands websites

first-block.main-heading-2: “The last mile service at your convenience”
first-block.body-text: Choose all the pieces you would like to try, we will bring them to you with no upfront payment.

second-block.body-text: Skip the process, we send back the pieces you don't want.

third-block.body-text: Shop on your schedule with times available from 9am to 9pm, 7 days a week.

fourth-block.body-text: Carbon footprint is considered with every step of our service.

1.title: Create your shopping basket
1.description: Choose all the pieces you want to try, shop freely. We will bring them to you with no upfront payment

2.title: Save your time
2.description: Forget to repack and send back! No stress, no wrong sizes, Emays will take any unwanted items back to the store for you.

3.title: Schedule as needed
3.description: Book your one hour window schedule, available 9am to 9pm, 7 days a week. Take your time, we wait you try. You have 40 minutes to try and make a decision.

4.title: Store at home
4.description: Whatever you wish, wherever you are. Pick where you want to try your items, whether it’s at your own home, office or hotel we deliver to you

4_1.description: Your style concierge will deliver your items to you and come back only to take the payment and collect any unwanted items.

4_2.description: Your style concierge will help with styling advice throughout out your time. If any adjustment is necessary we pin and tailor any items to make it perfect for you.

5.title: Finalize your purchase
5.description: We'll guide you through the seamless checkout process. Our user-friendly interface makes it easy for you to review your chosen items.

6.title: Climate Conscious
6.description: We take the climate and the environment seriously and believe in sustainable fashion. That's why we consider the carbon footprint with every step of our service. Understanding the impact that the fashion industry can have on the environment, we're committed to doing our part to minimize it.

landing.title: WE SHIP THE SHOP
landing.sub-header: Bring the Luxury shopping experience to your clients
landing.description: Convert, grow and retain customers with Emays

info-box.title: Maximise and increase sales
info-box.description: Personalised luxury experience for customers, assisted at every touch point of the shopping process by expert advisors at their own comfort

info-box.title: Full inventory control
info-box.description: If unsold, the product will return and be available in your store within 24 hours

info-box.title: Converting new clients
info-box.description: Our services aims to make shopping easier towards brands for new customers to engage and overcome barriers such as:

info-box.title: E-commerce
info-box.description: Emays connects with all primary E-commerce platforms and a simple API for anything more customized. Emays appears as a new delivery method, the client will have the option to pick their delivery date, time, and Emays services at the check out

info-box.title: In- Store
info-box.description: An easy to use web interface to book Emays deliveries and services that can be installed using in store devices such as phones and computers

info-box.title: RETAIL EXCELLENCE
info-box.description: At Emays we believe that the customer experience always comes first. Our integration has been built to give the feeling of your brand and experience, just powered by Emays. Our aim is to create a pleasurable customer experience easy to use

chart.title: FROM PROVEN DATA STUDIES
chart.description: A global consumer survey conducted by Content Square (leader in digital experience analytics) indicates that only 15% of respondents are satisfied with their online shopping experience. In the last 6 months of 2022, data show increasing customers problems with their packaging

integration.title: EASY INTEGRATION
integration.description: Seamless integrations with any API enabled platform

info-box.title: Ecommerce
info-box.description: -commerce software is created to simplify the shopping experience for high-end fashion retailers and their customers. Through the booking modal automatically appears at checkout inside the brand website - for customers in our coverage areas. With our appointment booking feature, customers can choose their preferred date and time for a stress-free shopping experience right at home. Retailers can easily manage orders and track their revenue with a designed dashboard.

info-box.title: In- Store
info-box.description: In-Store software is designed to streamline your operations and improve your customer experience. Our software is user-friendly and customizable, allowing you to tailor it to your specific needs. Let Emays help you simplify your retail operations and provide an exceptional shopping experience for your customers.
